profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering scalable and performant web applications with Vercel
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for building fast, reliable, and maintainable web applications. Proficient in modern programming languages and frameworks.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend 'Vercel' as a potential employer for the

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Vercel
description: Designed and implemented multiple high-traffic web applications using Next.js, TypeScript, and GraphQL.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless deployment and scaling of applications on Vercel's platform.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB for various clients.
Managed projects from concept to launch, ensuring timely delivery and meeting client expectations.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects using JavaScript, Python, and C++.
Ensured code quality, security, and maintainability through rigorous testing and peer review.
